column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My absolute favorite place to go in Chicago. Do not go during the weekend if you're worried about the crowd
column2: and the place is large so it's easy to get lost but the people who work there are good at helping you find your place and honestly
column3: if you like art and you want to see it what else is there to say? This is the place to go for a blind date
column7: or just some beauty for the soul.
